name: Stingwing Matriarch
desc: Giant wasp queen ruling the skies.

name: Death Weaver
desc: Master weaver of lethal trap webs.

name: Drift Jelly
desc: Small jellyfish drifting on air currents.

name: Tidal Jelly
desc: Large jelly pulling in prey with tidal force.

name: Tidal Jelly Monarch
desc: Enormous jelly monarch ruling the tidal pools.

name: Deep Jelly
desc: Deep-dwelling jelly adapted to crushing pressure.

name: Blood Stalker
desc: Predator drawn to the scent of blood.

name: Pack Howler Alpha
desc: Alpha predator commanding the hunting pack.

name: Phantom Stalker
desc: Semi-transparent predator fading in and out.

name: Doom Stalker
desc: Herald of destruction prowling the wastes.

name: Apex Stalker
desc: Ultimate predator at the top of the food chain.

name: Obsidian Golem
desc: Volcanic glass golem of deadly sharpness.

name: Void Sentinel
desc: Ancient guardian of the void boundary.

name: Oblivion Wraith
desc: Wraith from the edge of oblivion itself.

name: Omega Mass
desc: Final form of dark energy evolution.

name: Crystal Colossus
desc: Enormous crystalline titan guarding ancient secrets.

name: Blight Eye
desc: Eye spreading corruption with its gaze.

name: Void Eye
desc: Eye peering from the void itself.

name: God's Eye
desc: Eye of a being beyond comprehension.

name: The Formless One
desc: Entity of pure unreality, a living paradox.

name: Abyss Lurker
desc: First creature encountered in the abyss.

name: Deep Shade
desc: Shadow given form in the deep.

name: Abyssal Leviathan
desc: Massive serpent ruling the upper abyss.

name: Abyss Maw
desc: All mouth and hunger from the deep.

name: Void Kraken
desc: Multi-tentacled terror of the void depths.

name: Elder Serpent
desc: Ancient serpent of immense size and wisdom.

name: Cosmic Warden
desc: Warden of the cosmic barrier between realms.

name: Void Knight
desc: Knight sworn to serve the void.

name: The Primordial
desc: Being from before the dawn of creation.

name: Entropy Incarnate
desc: The living embodiment of entropy itself.

name: Sporeling Crawler
desc: A small fungal insect coated in bioluminescent spores.

name: Glowcap Drifter
desc: A floating fungal organism that emits electric spore bursts.

name: Mycelium Tendril
desc: A serpentine root-creature that erupts from the ground to strike.

name: Fungal Stalker
desc: A camouflaged predator that blends with the fungal undergrowth before lunging.

name: Sporeburst Beetle
desc: A heavily armored beetle that detonates toxic spore sacs on contact.

name: Rootweb Weaver
desc: A spider-like fungal creature that spins mycelium webs to trap prey.

name: Spore Shaman
desc: A sentient fungal entity that commands lesser spore creatures and hurls toxic bolts.

name: Mycelium Hulk
desc: A massive fungal construct animated by the mycelium network. Slow but terrifyingly powerful.

name: Hollow Queen
desc: The queen of the hollows â€” a massive fungal matriarch commanding the entire mycelium network.

name: Sand Scarab
desc: A golden-shelled beetle that burrows through sand and strikes from below.

name: Solar Automaton
desc: A corrupted research drone still running patrol protocols. Fires concentrated solar beams.

name: Mirage Viper
desc: A shimmering serpent that bends light around itself, appearing as a heat mirage until it strikes.

name: Dune Reaver
desc: A four-legged apex predator adapted to desert hunting. Uses pack tactics.

name: Sunfire Elemental
desc: Pure solar energy given form. Radiates intense heat and hurls plasma bolts.

name: Obsidian Crawler
desc: A massive beetle with obsidian-glass armor. Nearly impervious to physical attacks.

name: Canyon Wyrm
desc: A massive burrowing predator that tunnels through obsidian bedrock.

name: Sun Drake
desc: A winged predator that absorbs solar energy through its crystalline wings.

name: Solaris Prime
desc: The original master automaton of the Solarith research station â€” a colossal solar-powered war machine.

name: Void Sentinel
desc: An ancient citadel guard still executing patrol protocols.

name: Phase Stalker
desc: A predator that phases in and out of reality, appearing behind prey for devastating ambush attacks.

name: Rift Weaver
desc: A floating entity that manipulates tears in reality. Its tendrils reach through dimensional rifts.

name: Architect Drone
desc: A heavily armored construction drone from the Architect era, repurposed for combat.

name: Gravity Wraith
desc: A spectral entity born from gravitational distortions near the singularity.

name: Dimensional Predator
desc: A massive beast that exists simultaneously in multiple dimensions.

name: Singularity Warden
desc: The elite guard of the Singularity Core â€” a towering construct imbued with concentrated void energy.

name: Reality Shredder
desc: A serpentine void entity that literally tears holes in reality as it moves.

name: Void Sovereign
desc: The entity born when the singularity fractured reality â€” a being of pure void energy commanding absolute dominion over dimensional fabric.

name: Mine Tick
desc: Tiny parasites that cling to ore veins.

name: Ore Beetle
desc: Armored beetles that burrow through rock.

name: Cave Spider
desc: Fast predators lurking in mine shafts.

name: Crystal Mite
desc: Mites that feed on crystal formations.

name: Tunnel Lurker
desc: Ambush predators hiding in collapsed tunnels.

name: Bark Mite
desc: Tiny pests that nibble at plant roots.

name: Spore Wasp
desc: Aggressive wasps that spread toxic spores.

name: Root Crawler
desc: Burrowing creatures that surface near gatherers.
